name: GhostBall (AngryFrost)
description:
A little prototype for the Computer Based Animation class at Unisinos - 2019/2.

Inspired by the halloween month the game features a bunch of dancing ghosts having fun in a ball, and you gotta catch `em all.

To play simply choose one of the songs in the menu (Ghostballing or ShadowSong) and press Choose Song to Start; Esc brings back the main menu; Quit exits the application.

The main purpose of the project is to show the deformation of the meshes based on the different audio bands and the interaction between audio and animation/movement and lights, so there is no score or main goal, just enjoy!
